function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of implementation of evidence-based best practices for mitigating the effects of the pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and negative health outcomes","Mitigation":"Adopting evidence-based best practices for mitigating the effects of the pandemic","Technologies":"Health and safety technologies, building management systems","People":"Building occupants, employees, visitors","Owner":"Building management, health and safety professionals"},{"Description":"Inadequate long-term preparedness for critical health and safety issues","Impact":"Risk of being unprepared for future health crises and safety concerns","Mitigation":"Implementing long-term preparedness strategies and best practices","Technologies":"Health and safety technologies, building management systems","People":"Building occupants, employees, visitors","Owner":"Building management, health and safety professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of guidance towards evidence-based best practices for facility operations and management","Impact":"Potential for ineffective response to pandemic and other health crises","Mitigation":"Implementing the WELL Health-Safety Rating for Facility Operations and Management","Technologies":"Health and safety technologies, building management systems","People":"Building occupants, employees, visitors","Owner":"Building management, health and safety professionals"}]}
